## Entropy Analysis

```{r}
#| label: fig-entropy
#| fig-cap: "Entropy comparison between geographic regions and income groups."

library(r2d3)

# Your entropy data
entropy_data <- list(
  regions = list(
    entropy = 0.72,
    points = data.frame(x = c(...), y = c(...))
  ),
  income = list(
    entropy = 0.35,
    points = data.frame(x = c(...), y = c(...))
  )
)

# Create visualization
r2d3(data = entropy_data, script = "js/entropy_target.js", 
     width = 800, height = 400, dependencies = "js/d3-path.min.js")
```
